name: curled
content:

past simple and past participle of
curl
to make something into the shape of a curl, or to grow or change into this shape: Does your hair curl naturally, or is it permed? A new baby will automatically curl its fingers round any object it touches.
to make a ball move in a curved shape by hitting or kicking it in a particular way: He curled the ball into the top right hand corner. curl your lip
to show by an upward movement of one side of your mouth that you feel no respect for something or someone: Her lip curled at what he said.
